column39: Managing Member of the Manager of the Issuer

column40: The entity listed in Item 12 is not paid by the Issuer. It receives commissions or similar sales compensation equal to a percentage of the commitment made by each investor directly from such investor.
column52: Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith Incorporated
column66: Administrator will receive a semi-annual fee equal to a percentage of Issuer's (1) capital commitment to the underlying fund through the closing date of the underlying fund?s commitment and (2)thereafter on Issuer?s capital account in the underlying fund.
